df['ocean_proximity'].replace("INLAND", 1 , inplace = True)
df['ocean_proximity'].replace("NEAR OCEAN", 2 , inplace = True)
df['ocean_proximity'].replace("<1H OCEAN", 3 , inplace = True)
df['ocean_proximity'].replace("ISLAND", 5 , inplace = True)
df['ocean_proximity'].replace("NEAR BAY", 4 , inplace = True)
df['ocean_proximity'] = pd.to_numeric(df['ocean_proximity'])

source.d87abf8d:
figure, ((ax1, ax2), (ax3, ax4), (ax5, ax6)) = plt.subplots(nrows=3, ncols=2)
figure.set_size_inches(40,30)
sn.regplot(df['total_rooms'], df['median_house_value'], ax=ax1)
sn.regplot(df['total_bedrooms'], df['median_house_value'], ax=ax2)
sn.regplot(df['population'], df['median_house_value'], ax=ax3)
sn.regplot(df['households'], df['median_house_value'], ax=ax4)
sn.regplot(df['median_income'], df['median_house_value'], ax=ax5)
sn.regplot(df['median_house_value'], df['median_house_value'], ax=ax6)

fig , ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(12,8))
ax.scatter(x= df["total_rooms"],y = df["median_house_value"])
ax.set_xlabel("total_rooms")
ax.set_ylabel("median_house_value")
plt.show()

df = df[df['total_rooms']< 12000]
fig , ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(12,6))
ax.scatter(x= df["total_rooms"],y = df["median_house_value"])
ax.set_xlabel("total_rooms")
ax.set_ylabel("median_house_value")
